Karim Bare (amụrụ ya n'October 28, 1983) bụ onye Nijeri
ia bụbu onye na-egwu mmiri, onye ọkachamara na sprint freestyle events

Bare ruru eru maka 100m freestyle nke ụmụ nwoke na Summer Olympics nke afọ 2000 na Sydney, site n'inweta ebe Universality site na FINA n'enwetaghị oge ntinye. O sonyere na okpomọkụ mbụ a na-ahụtụbeghị mbụ megide ndị ọzọ na-egwu mmiri Farkhod Oripov nke obodo Tajikistan na Eric Moussambani nke Equatorial Guinea

Tupu asọmpi ahụ amalite, Bare banyere n'ime ọdọ mmiri ahụ, ya na Obidoro tupu na-akụ égbè ahụ, ma mesịa bụrụ ndị a chụpụrụ maka mmalite na-ezighị ezi, bịa-ahapụ Moussambani dị ka nwoke ikpeazụ guzoro.
